attributes.action: Ban Harmful Artificial Ingredients within all Foods & Drink
attributes.additional_details:
Harmful

Unnecessary, A drug, Depression, Anti-Social behaviour, Critical Physical & Mental Health.

Solution

Get rid of it.

Encourage a Healthy lifestyle and make this the norm within the UK.

Additional Information

It is the responsibility of the government to ban the sale of drugs (chemicals and harmful substances) disguised within Food and Drink.
